concept.title: 218.204 Humanitarian or peacekeeping operation.

conbody.p: The following requirements do not apply to acquisitions that, as determined by the head of the contracting activity, are in support of humanitarian or peacekeeping operations:
(1) Policy for item unique identification at 211.274-2(a). See 211.274-2(b).
(2) Only one offer requirements at sections 215.371-2. See 215.371-4(a)(2).
